summary: When the boss of a ruling Hong Kong triad is arrested and executed in China for counterfeiting money, mayhem ensues as the mob's leading contenders circle the throne.
cast: Tian-Lin Wang|Eddie Cheung|Suet Lam|Simon Yam|Bernice Liu|Andy On|Luxia Jiang|Ken Lo|Michael Wai-Man Chan|Pinky Cheung|Xin Xin Xiong|Lok-yi Lai|Amy Chum|Woon-Ling Hau|Wai Leung Wong|Sam Kai-Sen Huang|Jian Dong Liu|Tong Yao Cui|Xuanlong Zhao|Sen Lin Zhu|Erica Chan|Kwok Ping Lam|Sze Ming Lai|Chi Fai So|Wong Yin Keung|Chun Han|Hak-Shing Keung|Anthony Carpio|Chin Wah Ng|Pui Shu Iu|Wai-Lok Chan|Tat-Kwong Chan
title: Mit moon
